summary: A devastating and heart-rending take on grizzly bear activists Timothy Treadwell and Amie Huguenard, who were killed in October of 2003 while living among grizzly bears in Alaska.
cast: Werner Herzog|Carol Dexter|Val Dexter|Sam Egli|Franc G. Fallico|Willy Fulton|Marc Gaede|Marnie Gaede|Sven Haakanson Jr.|Amie Huguenard|David Letterman|Jewel Palovak|Kathleen Parker|Warren Queeney|Timothy Treadwell|Larry Van Daele
keywords: man eaten by a bear|katmai national park alaska|interview|filmmaker|family relationships
title: Grizzly Man
